Title: Penguin Minna Kyou Dai 2020
Description: ["Music video directed by Yoshiki Imazu for the short version of Masashi Sada's song ", Penguin Minna Kyou Dai 2020, ' that was included on his album "Raison d\'Ãªtre". The song is a remake of his 1997 single about stopping CO2 emissions. The 2020 song expands on this message to include the broader Sustainable Development Goals proposed by the United Nations.']
